TopicTitle: Need Opinions - Reign of the Dragons

Articles.Content:
Take a listen and let me know what you think. I have been getting some reviews from other places that range from "Meh" to "WOW!" I trust the KSP community since I bring a good number of my music to you guys and gals.

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/reign-of-the-dragons
